page.title: 12GALGORM PLAYGROUP
page.content: On arrival at the playgroup we were greeted by Mrs. Gamble who told us to make ourselves at home. The children were working with plasticine,making jigsaws and building lego. We sat down at a table and mixed with the children who were very friendly. On the walls of the room there were coloured pictures the children had made. At the bottom of the room there was an imitation sink,cupboards, a bed,a table and chairs where the children played 'houses'. At eleven o'clock the children were lined up to go to the toilet. Then they sat in a circle and were given milk and biscuits. The children always do something, we helped them make butterflies. After this is was story time and the playgroup ended at half past twelve.
